html:
Get the lowest price ever on Apple AirPods Pro 2

The Black Friday AirPods Pro deal discounts the 2nd Gen model with USB-C to $153.99, a $96 markdown and the lowest price on record.

It's unclear how long the holiday promotion will last, as AirPods Pro 2 are a top seller each holiday season. And with the $153.99 price being the lowest on record, bargain hunters are likely to pick up a pair to replace an older model or as a gift for friends and family.

You can save on other AirPods models, including AirPods Max and the budget-friendly AirPods 4 as well. Discounted prices start at just $119 across the line.

AirPods

  • AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off)
  • AirPods 4 with ANC: $168.99 ($11 off)
  • AirPods Pro 2 USB-C: $153.99 ($96 off)
  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with USB-C Charging: $499.99 ($50 off)
  • AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones with Lightning Charging: $399.99 ($150 off)

Beats

  • Beats Studio Buds: $79.99 ($70 off)
  • Beats Solo 4 Wireless On-Ear Headphones: $99.99 ($100 off)
